channel.title: Adding pvp at lumbridge | help please!
channel.description:
hm, ive changed everything at home got all shops, changed everying, i want and now i wan2 to change like as they go out of the castle, of lumbridge its pvp
thanks in advance if u helped me !!!

item.title: Adding pvp at lumbridge | help please!
item.dc:creator: @DemonsworldOwner DemonsworldOwner
item.description:
@DemonsworldOwner wrote:

Look for something about wildnerss, then get the biggest x and y coords to smallest. and add them and you should have wild.(NOTE: only do that in box form)

Read full topic
item.source: Adding pvp at lumbridge | help please!
